catch_copy: Design your dream boutique, sell trendy clothes, and build a fashion empire! It's your turn to shine in Clothing Store Simulator.
description:
Ready to Write Your Own Fashion Story?

Experience the thrill of managing the city's most popular clothing store from scratch on Nintendo Switch™ with Clothing Store Simulator! Transforming a small shop into a huge fashion hub is entirely in your hands.

Impress Customers with Your Style Stock your shelves with the trendiest dresses, stylish shirts, and eye-catching accessories. Understand your customers' needs, offer the right products, and build a loyal customer base by increasing satisfaction.

Redesign Your Store Selling clothes isn't enough; the atmosphere matters! Choose from a vast catalog of furniture. Arrange shelves, fitting rooms, and decorations to your taste. A minimalist boutique or a colorful shopping haven? You are the designer!

Grow and Expand Invest your earnings wisely. Physically expand your store, add more product variety, and boost your sales volume. Manage checkout lines and ensure your store always looks perfect.

Features:

Detailed Store Management: Track stock, set prices, and manage profit margins.

Customizable Interior: Design every corner, from wall colors to furniture.

Dynamic Customer System: Interact with customers having different expectations.

Progression System: A journey from a small business to a giant brand.


Unlock the doors to the fashion world and become the tycoon of retail with Clothing Store Simulator!
network_feature_description:
This software supports the following:
- Touch screen
- Surround sound (linear PCM)
